sentences.en: But a lot of movies portray China in a negative light.
sentences.cn: 但是很多电影都是负面地反映中国.

sentences.en: Can you portray the best and worst aspects of this job?
sentences.cn: 您能描述一下这份工作最好与最坏的方面 吗 ?

sentences.en: He believes the character will portray a different SSH.
sentences.cn: 好象可以展示出变得不一样的宋承宪的样子.

sentences.en: He has worked hard in recent months to portray New York in a better light.
sentences.cn: 最近几个月里他努力从更积极的角度来描绘纽约。

sentences.en: His most famous painting portrayed the death of Nelson.
sentences.cn: 他最著名的画作描绘的是纳尔逊之死。

sentences.en: It is difficult to portray feelings in words.
sentences.cn: 感情很难用言语来描写.

sentences.en: It is not easy to portray the surprise of the Indian at this discovery.
sentences.cn: 印第安人见到这种情况,其惊异之情真是难以形容.

sentences.en: It is still not considered proper to portray Christ in a play or film.
sentences.cn: 人们仍然认为在戏剧或电影中再现基督的形象是不妥当的.

sentences.en: It would be wrong to portray his life as a calculated ascent to power at any cost.
sentences.cn: 如果把他的一生描述成不惜任何代价一心想向上爬，那就错了。

sentences.en: Phantasmagoria portray the unspeakable, they rise above the written language.
sentences.cn: 幻影描绘无法形容的事物, 它超越了语言文字.

sentences.en: Religion was portrayed in a negative way.
sentences.cn: 对宗教的描写是负面的。

sentences.en: Romantic artists portrayed nature as wild and powerful.
sentences.cn: 浪漫主义艺术家描绘的大自然是狂野而强大的。

sentences.en: She frowned and stamped her feet to portray anger, eg in a mime.
sentences.cn: 她又皱眉头又跺脚表示生气(如在哑剧中).

sentences.en: That's what we tried to portray in the book, this feeling of opulence and grandeur.
sentences.cn: 那就是我们在书中竭力描绘的——一种富丽堂皇的气派。

sentences.en: The final chapters portray the witness of the church far beyond Jerusalem.
sentences.cn: 最后的几个章节是关于在远离耶路撒冷之地教会的见证.

sentences.en: The image I portray and the example I set becomes tarnished.
sentences.cn: 我所树立的形象和榜样也会因此被玷污.

sentences.en: The poor beggar looked silly trying to portray the role of Hamlet.
sentences.cn: 那可怜虫因为拼命想把哈姆雷特的角色演好而大出洋相.

sentences.en: The President likes to portray himself as a friend of working people.
sentences.cn: 总统喜欢以工薪阶层的朋友自居。

sentences.en: These diagrams, therefore , portray what is " really " happening.
sentences.cn: 这些图象描述的是 “ 实际 ” 发生的过程.

words.tran_cn: 记述者；描画者；肖像画家

trans.tran_cn: 扮演（角色），描述，描绘，表现
trans.tran_en: to describe or show someone or something in a particular way, according to your opinion of them

trans.tran_cn: 描写， 描绘； 扮演， 饰演
trans.tran_en: to describe or represent something or someone
